workflows.name: cargo-clippy
workflows.description: Run Clippy as a Cargo subcommand to analyze and lint Rust code in projects, including workspaces and dependencies.
workflows.input: Cargo.toml-based project directory, optional flags like --all-targets, --fix, environment variables like RUSTFLAGS, configuration files like clippy.toml.
workflows.output: Lint diagnostics printed to stdout/stderr, optionally modified source files if --fix is used, exit code indicating errors.

workflows.name: clippy-driver
workflows.description: Invoke Clippy directly as a compiler driver similar to rustc for linting individual files or non-Cargo setups.
workflows.input: Rust source files (.rs), rustc-like command-line arguments, optional sysroot.
workflows.output: Lint diagnostics, compiled artifacts if compilation succeeds.

workflows.name: build-source
workflows.description: Compile Clippy from source code, including all sub-crates and binaries.
workflows.input: Rust toolchain (nightly recommended), Cargo workspace configuration.
workflows.output: Executable binaries (cargo-clippy, clippy-driver) in target/debug or target/release.

workflows.name: testing
workflows.description: Execute comprehensive tests including unit tests, UI tests, compile-tests, and dogfooding to validate lints and codebase.
workflows.input: Test configurations in tests/, UI test files in ui/ and tests/ui-*, updated via cargo bless.
workflows.output: Pass/fail status, detailed logs, updated .stderr and .fixed files for UI tests.
workflows.entry_point: tests/compile-test.rs (for compile tests), cargo test for unit, clippy_dev/src/dogfood.rs for dogfooding

workflows.name: lint-development
workflows.description: Develop and integrate new lints or modify existing ones, including registration and testing.
workflows.input: Lint logic implementation, test cases, lint metadata.
workflows.output: New or updated lint modules in clippy_lints, registered in central lint declarations.

workflows.name: lintcheck
workflows.description: Run Clippy on a curated set of external crates to detect regressions, false positives, or new lint triggers.
workflows.input: Crate lists in lintcheck_*.toml, optional filters or targets.
workflows.output: JSON or text logs of lint applications, diffs for changes.

workflows.name: deprecate-lint
workflows.description: Deprecate an existing lint, remove its implementation, and update references.
workflows.output: Removed code, updated registries, migration guides if needed.

workflows.name: release-process
workflows.description: Manage the release cycle including version bumping, changelog updates, tagging, and publishing to crates.io.
workflows.output: New git tags, published crate versions, updated documentation.

workflows.name: sync-rustc
workflows.description: Synchronize Clippy's dependencies and code with updates to the Rust compiler internals.
workflows.output: Updated vendored sources or Cargo deps, adapted API usages.
